snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include the costs and benefits of people logging into Web sites with Twitter or Facebook, Tim Cook’s proposal for...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include the costs and benefits of people logging into Web sites with Twitter or Facebook, Tim Cook’s proposal for encouraging companies (like Apple) to bring foreign profits home to the United States and a fantasy Google Island.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Apple's Tax Plan and Virtual Biology
